message: Let's start fair. I get the lion's share, but you get a decent starting point.  Accept and we're done.
You took a big cut last round, now it's your turn to compromise!
I'm willing to give you more, but we need to meet in the middle.  This is my final offer before the next round, and we'll both lose money.
You're getting closer to the middle, but I'm not there yet!
